comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
The photo is taken on the same occasion as the ones outside the Spotlite Club. The bands of Roy Eldridge and Coleman Hawkins played there from about August 1 until September 30, 1946. 
(“Goings on about Town: Three Deuces,” New Yorker, August 3–September 28, 1946).
